original_title: Songs in the Key of Sex
overview: Gotta sing, gotta dance, gotta have sex. Welcome to Dory's Paradise Lounge, a mecca for future crooners and the groupies trying to get a jump on tomorrow's stars today. At Dory's, you can get just about anything you want-- for a song. Jason Ross gets fucked twice! Randy Mixer (box) and Danny Sommers flip-flop!
title: Songs in the Key of Sex
